participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and talkative, enjoys sharing opinions and experiences.
participant_1.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i have short brown hair. i met taylor swift. i am a convenience store manager. my favourite music is country music.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and determined, passionate about helping others.
participant_2.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

content.text: I like chicken. Why don't you?
